name: Press Shift to Split
description:
A puzzle platformer where you control two sides of the same character.

Light the candles and leave as one.

Made in 72 hours for the BenBonk #3 Jam. 

CONTROLS

  • Left Shift to split.
  • Q+E to move black side.
  • A+D to move white side and when merged.
  • Jump with Space.
  • Esc to pause.

KNOWN BUGS

  • WEBGL main menu shows unity skybox.
  • Second level can be beat without lighting all candles.
  • 3rd level can be unbeatable.
  • Level select buttons do not line up.

CREDITS

  • Uses Kenney audio.
  • The following royalty free tracks where provided by Tunetank:
  • SugarTape - Funk 
  • RedLionProduction - Comedy Episode 
  • Cinematic Alex - Here We Go!
